entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.9°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning early this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Flurries beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
